word: H3201 - יָכֹל - yâkôl - yaw-kole' - Be able - முடியுமாயிரு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - மேற்கொள், கூடும், ஏதுவாயிரு, முடியும், ஜெயித்துக்கொள், பலப்படு, முறியடி, சமர்த்தனாகு, ஜெயி, ஆகு, நடக்கப்பண்ணு, பொறு, தக்கதாயிறு
to prevail, to overcome, to endure, to have power, to be able (Qal)
1) to be able, to be able to gain or accomplish, to be able to endure, to be able to reach
2) to prevail, to prevail over or against, to overcome, to be victor
3) to have ability, to have strength

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to be able, literally (can, could) or morally (may, might): - be able, any at all (ways), attain, can (away with, [-not]), could, endure, might, overcome, have power, prevail, still, suffer.
Cognate: H3201, H3203
